name: Cackling Skeleton
description: The Cackling Skeleton is a medium-sized undead creature with unsettling laughter and a mocking demeanor, making it appear more sinister.
memorable: Its ability to impose disadvantage on attacks through cackling makes it unique in combat.
goals: To demoralize and disrupt living foes in battle.
relations: Often found among other undead or malicious creatures.
environment: Commonly found in graveyards, haunted locations, or areas rife with undead.
strengths: Immunities to poison damage and conditions like exhaustion enhance its resilience.
weaknesses: Vulnerability to effects that turn undead significantly affects its survival.
attacks: Executes a Slam attack with a chance to hit harder if targets are demoralized.
most_powerful_ability: The Cackle demoralizes opponents, giving them disadvantage on attack rolls.
senses: It possesses darkvision, allowing it to see in darkness.
additional_information: Can target multiple foes with its Mock ability.
Demoralizes opponents, affecting their combat effectiveness.
Relatively easy to defeat due to low Armor Class.
Immunities help it withstand certain attacks.
test_queries: creature that disrupts attacks with laughter
